column2: BRIEF-Granite Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.29 April 30 (Reuters) - Granite Construction Inc: * Q1 REVENUE $563.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $529.9 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.35 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * AT QUARTER-END, COMPANY BACKLOG OF $3.59 BILLION UP 4.4 PERCENT YEAR-OVER-YEAR * SEES LOW-DOUBLE DIGIT CONSOLIDATED REVENUE GROWTH FOR 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Granite Awarded $27 Mln Highway Project In Alaska April 26 (Reuters) - Granite Construction Inc: * GRANITE AWARDED $27 MILLION HIGHWAY PROJECT IN ALASKA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Granite Announces Planned Retirement Of Chief Financial Officer April 23 (Reuters) - Granite Construction Inc: * GRANITE ANNOUNCES PLANNED RETIREMENT OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER * GRANITE CONSTRUCTION INC - KRZEMINSKI WILL CONTINUE IN HER ROLE AS CFO UNTIL HER SUCCESSOR IS APPOINTED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
